title: Christo's valley curtain
creator_credit: Albert Maysles, David Maysles, Ellen Gifford, Thomas Handloser and Maysles Films, Inc.
brief_description: A documentary by the Maysles Brothers focusing on the construction of a five hundred foot valley curtain by Bulgarian artist Christo. Examines the erection of the veil across Rifle Gap (part of the Grand Canyon) and presents smaller art works by Christo which were used in preparation for the event.
